posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony N
I am currently looking to purchase a T206 Ty Cobb - green background with a Piedmont back, around a SGC 40 with nice centering.

Also, looking at either a Cobb/Jennings or Cobb/Moriarity T202 "Cobb Steals Third" around the same grade - SGC 40.  If you have either of these cards for sale, please email me pics and your price.

Thanks, Tony.

Still looking...Anyone know if either of these cards are coming up in any auctions?

Thanks,
Tony

Tony - if you're interested, I have both of these that I'd like to sell - contact me and we'll work something out.
[IMG]http://lh4.ggpht.com/_pAhpQ3jIX9M/Si8RYqnGCJI/AAAAAAAAECQ/7kbU6BVJLDc/s512/scan0018.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://lh5.ggpht.com/_pAhpQ3jIX9M/SgOoDYs8kbI/AAAAAAAAD9w/lk4oB_mim-w/s512/image-21.jpg[/IMG]

Matt,

That Sporting Life Cobb is very nice, however, I already have that card in a lower grade.  Not interested in the T-205 at this time.  By the looks of those cards, I don't think you will have any problem trying to sell them!

Best of luck,
Tony

Looks like someone heard you on the green Piedmont backed T206 Cobb:
